nodes.bodyText: Please check with Tracy to see if he thinks this should be called io.openliberty.ejbcontainer.security.internal or io.openliberty.ejbcontainer.v40.internal.security
nodes.diffHunk:

 com.ibm.ws.security.jaas.common=io.openliberty.security.jaas.internal.common,,"Security JAAS Implementation","Security JAAS Implementation; Jakarta Enabled"

nodes.bodyText: @jvanhill No preference; this is not a project supported by my team.  The com.ibm.ws.ejbcontainer.security* projects are supported by the security team, I'd check with them.  From a strictly jakartaee perspective, that seems to be the direction we are headed.  Not sure exactly who on security teams supports these projects, but it appears the last person to modify them was @toshiyamamoto.

nodes.bodyText: Since this bundle is not / will not be specific to EJB 4.0, I would rather we leave the version out of it. I will leave it with this bundle name unless someone else has a strong objection / reason to change it.

nodes.bodyText: Oh, sorry to bring this up so late, but "EJB" is trademarked, so should probably be changed to "Jakarta Enterprise Bean container".
